snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes a call for new methods for fighting malware, products that may feel pressure from Apple's new operating system and...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes a call for new methods for fighting malware, products that may feel pressure from Apple's new operating system and the arrest of a man accused of stealing more than 40,000 credit card numbers.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Creative Corrosion and Perfect Tweets
